text:
[Verse]
Under the gray skies
We’re laughing tonight
Big drops are falling
Dancing in the night

[Verse 2]
Puddles are our stage
We’re twirling with grace
Spinning round so wild
Rain falls on our face

[Chorus]
Dance in the rain
Feel the joy again
Splashing down the lane
No more feeling plain

[Verse 3]
Barefoot in the street
The rhythm we meet
Raindrops keep the beat
Our hearts feel the heat

[Chorus]
Dance in the rain
Feel the joy again
Splashing down the lane
No more feeling plain

[Bridge]
Sky opens wide
Only you and I
All the worries slide
Let the world just fly
title: Dancing in the Rain
